name: Master Pizza Dough
summary: It's easy and fast to make your own pizza crust from scratch, and it tastes homemade, too.
ingredients: 2 ½ cups all-purpose flour, or as needed
1 cup very warm water (120 degrees F to 130 degrees F)
directions: In a large bowl, combine 2 cups flour, undissolved yeast, and salt
Stir very warm water and olive oil into flour mixture
Stir in enough remaining flour to make soft dough
Knead on lightly floured surface until smooth and elastic, about 4 to 6 minutes
Cover; let rest on floured surface 10 minutes
Lightly oil 1 (14-inch) or 2 (12-inch) round pizza pan(s)
Divide and roll dough to fit desired pan(s)
Bake at 400 degrees F for 20 to 30 minutes or until done
Baking time depends on size and thickness of crust and selected toppings
yield: 1 14-inch thick crust pizza or 2 12-inch thin crust
